Francois Trudel

Software engineer experienced with performance-critical systems, game development, AI, aviation and military simulations, academic research and agile leadership. Whether it's designing scalable back-end architectures, optimizing performance in real-time environments, or diving deeper into the fascinating world of machine learning – I'm ready to embark on the next adventure.
